verbs.description: [ARG0: social security] [V: paid] [ARG1: 20 million to 678 dead people] [ARGM-ADV: according to a may 24 report from the social security administration inspector - general 678 beneficiaries who were verified as deceased as of april 2017 received approximately 20 million in improper payments for 9 to 206 months after their dates of death were recorded on the numident social security social security administration ssa numident]
